title: Inferring comparative advantage via entropy maximization. (arXiv:2304.12245v1 [cs.SI])
abstract: We revise the procedure proposed by Balassa to infer comparative advantage, which is a standard tool, in Economics, to analyze specialization (of countries, regions, etc.). Balassa's approach compares the export of a product for each country with what would be expected from a benchmark based on the total volumes of countries and products flows. Based on results in the literature, we show that the implementation of Balassa's idea generates a bias: the prescription of the maximum likelihood used to calculate the parameters of the benchmark model conflicts with the model's definition. Moreover, Balassa's approach does not implement any statistical validation. translated_title: 利用熵最大化推断比较优势
translated_abstract: 我们修改了Balassa提出的推断比较优势的方法，这是经济学中用于分析国家、地区等专业化的标准工具。Balassa的方法将每个国家的产品出口与基于国家和产品流量的总量的基准预期进行比较。根据文献中的结果，我们表明Balassa的方法会产生偏差：用于计算基准模型参数的最大似然度量法的建议与模型的定义相冲突。此外，Balassa的方法没有实现任何统计验证。因此，我们提出了一种基于熵最大化框架的替代方法来克服这种限制，并实现了适当的假设检验：一个国家的“关键产品”是那些产量显着大于在限制相同信息量的零模型下预期的产品。
tldr: 该论文提出了一种利用熵最大化框架推断比较优势的方法来分析国家、地区等专业化，并克服了使用Balassa方法时产生的偏差和统计验证方面的不足。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes a new method using entropy maximization framework to infer comparative advantage, for analyzing specialization (of countries, regions, etc.) and overcoming the bias and lack of statistical validation when using Balassa's method.
